data.comment: Today's referee, Christaan Bax, has blown to start the match.
Eljero Elia puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Sander Van de Streek.
Miguel Araujo grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at De Oude Meerdijk.
Goal! Lucas Bernadou gives Emmen a 2-1 lead in Emmen.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Emmen.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The away team have replaced Bart Ramselaar with Adrian Dalmau. This is the first substitution made today by Rene Hake.
In the minute 60, Joris Overeem is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Dick Lukkien is making the team's first substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Sekou Sidibe replacing Marko Kolar.
Donis Avdijaj is replacing Anco Jansen for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
In the minute 75, Goal! The away team take a 2-3 lead through Adrian Dalmau.
Gyrano Kerk instrumental with a fine assist.
Rene Hake (Utrecht) is making a second substitution, with Moussa Sylla replacing Eljero Elia.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Nick Bakker with Ben Scholte. This is the third substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
That's full-time at De Oude Meerdijk. The final score is 2-3.
